name: Hidden Object World
description:
Hidden Object World includes a beautiful garden themed game, with the option to download up to 8 additional Hidden Object games for free! Choose among a variety of themes including Mystery, Garden, Ghosts, Halloween, Dogs, Kitchen and more!

MAIN FEATURES:
-One full game included, and the option to download many more for free!
-Play any of the downloaded games offline.
-Gorgeous HD quality artwork.
-200 levels of fun gameplay in Campaign mode.
-Find objects by their names, pictures, or silhouettes.
-Exciting Match3 and Memory mini games!
-Daily Rewards and Bonus Levels to earn more coins!
-Amazing 3D art gallery brings scenes to life.

In each game, you can play through a map-based CAMPAIGN, or choose how you want to hunt for the items in FREE PLAY mode.

Play the CAMPAIGN over 200 beautiful levels with increasing difficulty. Things start off easy as you hunt for objects by Picture. Time limits and exciting bonus rounds are added, and pretty soon you will be searching for items by Silhouette and Word, or trying to find rotated Picture items. Challenge yourself to earn 3 star ratings on each level! Hints are available if you get stuck!

Choose exactly how you want to play in FREE PLAY mode. There are 4 ways to find the items: Picture, Silhouette, Word or Random. Select the relaxing Casual mode, or more challenging modes with time limits and bonus rounds. Practice mode is also included.
